item.description:
Once again, we're joining forces with the Web Design Meetup Group. This is our second time at the Trident Cafe on Newbury Street, and folks seem to like the location and the time.

Let's keep the momentum going! Once we get enough regular attendees, we can have the back room all to ourselves!

This month, in addition to your business cards, make sure to bring three things that you're looking for--whether professionally or personally. We're going to do a networking exercise aimed at making one-off connections.

For more information, see http://www.tridentboo...

group.name: The Boston Graphic Design Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Graphic Design April Meetup
